greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Alternating with hexagonal stutters: if n is hexagonal (2k^2 - k, i.e., A000384) then a(n)=a(n-1), otherwise a(n) = 1 - a(n-1).
comment: The row sums equal A110654 and the alternating row sums equal A130472. - _Johannes W. Meijer_, Aug 12 2015
formula: G.f.: x/(1-x^2) - (1+x)^(-1)*Sum(n>=1, x^(n*(2*n-1))). The sum is related to Theta functions. - _Robert Israel_, Aug 12 2015
example: Hexagonal numbers start 1,6,15, ... so this sequence goes 0 0 (stutter at 1) 1 0 1 0 0 (stutter at 6) 1 0 1 0 1 0 1 0 0 (stutter at 15) 1 0, etc.
maple: T := proc(n, k): if k mod 2 = 1 then return(1) else return(0) fi: end: seq(seq(T(n, k), k=0..n), n=0..13);  # _Johannes W. Meijer_, Aug 12 2015
xref: As a simple triangular or square array virtually the only sequences which appear are A000004, A000012 and A000035.
results.author: _Henry Bottomley_, Mar 22 2001
